body.p:
Somerset Ky aug 30th 64
His Excellency
Thomas E Bramlette

Your petitioner would respectfully represent that Hiram Stephenson an old man & paralytic was by the Pulaski circuit court find for Keeping Tipling house -- the sum of $60 & cots. That he was arrested upon Capias Profine & thrown into Jail & for the purpose of releasing him as an act of humanity the undersigned Replived the judgt & had him discharged
They ask that the Judgt on repleven bond be remitted --

W. H. Pillis
E L Van Winkle
& others, --

Pulaski Cir Ct
vs
H Stephenson
$60
Remitted
30th Aug/64

Pulaski County
Remission
Hiram Stephenson & others
